reference.title: apiEventClassifier
reference.shortdesc: The <apiEventClassifier> element identifies an event value that is an instance of a classifier.

refbody.section:
DescriptionThis element can provide an href attribute if the description of the API item is available. If the description is not available, the <apiEventClassifier> element can provide the name of the API item in its contents. This element has the following added attributes: href keyref, type, format, scope (local | peer | external), outputclass.
If you use an href attribute to a DITA API topic that describe the related API item, you do not need any other attrubutes.
If you supply an href to some other format (such as HTML), you need to supply the name of the related API item inside the <apiEventClassifier> element.
If you cannot provide an href (for instance, if the description of the related API item might not be available), you must provide the name of the related API item inside the <apiEventClassifier> element and the fully qualified name of the element in the keyref attribute. The keyref attribute should provide a unique key such as a fully qualified classifier name for the named API item.
For instance, in the Java API Specialization, the <apiEventClassifier> element represents the javaExceptionClass or javaConstructorClass for a class.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following example shows a <apiEventClassifier></apiEventClassifier> element for a Visual Basic 6.0 event:
example.codeblock: <apiOperationDef> <ph>The enumerated values for FileType are:</ph> <apiEventClassifier >vbext_ft_Form</apiEventClassifier> <apiType name="vbext_ft_Form" value="0"> <apiDefNote>File type is a form.<apiDefNote> <apiEventClassifier>vbext_ft_Module</apiEventClassifier> <apiType name="vbext_ft_Form" value="1"> <apiDefNote>File type is a basic module.<apiDefNote> <apiEventClassifier>vbext_ft_Class</apiEventClassifier> <apiType name="vbext_ft_Form" value="2"> <apiDefNote>File type is a class module.<apiDefNote> <apiEventClassifier>vbext_ft_Exe</apiEventClassifier> <apiType name="vbext_ft_Form" value="3"> <apiDefNote>File type is an executable file.<apiDefNote> <apiReturnClassifier>None.</apiReturnClassifier> </apiOperationDef>>
